head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths RESSLER, IRA RICHARD

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths RESSLER, IRA RICHARD

block.p: RESSLER-Ira Richard. The Officers, Board of Directors, and staff of UJA-Federation of NY mourn the passing of Ira Richard Ressler, beloved father and father-in-law of Debra and Leon David Black. Debra and Leon are admired and respected within the UJA-Federation family for their extraordinary leadership, commitment, and philanthropy. To Debra and Leon, and to the entire family, we extend our sincerest condolences. James S. Tisch, President Larry Zicklin, Board Chair & President-Elect John S. Ruskay, Exec VP & CEO

RESSLER-Ira. The Benjamin N. Cardozo School of Law of Yeshiva University expresses heartfelt condolences to Debra (and Cardozo Director Leon) Black on the loss of her father. May the entire family be comforted among the mourners of Zion and Jerusalem. Dr. Norman Lamm, President Yeshiva University Robert M. Beren, Chairman Board of Trustees Earle I. Mack, Chairman Benjamin N. Cardozo School of Law Board of Directors Paul R. Verkuil, Dean
RESSLER-Ira. A gentle man who gave his friendship to so many will be remembered forever. Herbert & Claire Siegel & Family
